body:
## Summary

`Openblas` (versions 0.2.20, 0.2.19, 0.2.18, 0.2.17, 0.2.16, 0.2.15) will not build on **Power9** nodes using `XL` compilers (versions 13.1.6, 13.1.7).

### Expected Result

Successful installation of `openblas` with an `XL` compiler.

### Actual Result

```
dantopa@cn2023:spack.power9.latest $ spack install openblas % xl@13.1.7
==> Installing openblas
==> Fetching file:///usr/projects/draco/vendors/spack.mirror/openblas/openblas-0.2.20.tar.gz
######################################################################## 100.0%
==> Staging archive: /projects/draco/vendors/spack.power9.latest/var/spack/stage/openblas-0.2.20-nqp5efrrhobdbmggi3455qppmwfxk6qm/v0.2.20.tar.gz
==> Created stage in /projects/draco/vendors/spack.power9.latest/var/spack/stage/openblas-0.2.20-nqp5efrrhobdbmggi3455qppmwfxk6qm
==> Applied patch make.patch
==> Building openblas [MakefilePackage]
==> Executing phase: 'edit'
==> Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' 'CC=/projects/draco/vendors/spack.power9.latest/lib/spack/env/xl/xlc' 'FC=/projects/draco/vendors/spack.power9.latest/lib/spack/env/xl/xlf' 'MAKE_NO_J=1' 'USE_OPENMP=0' 'USE_THREAD=0' 'libs' 'netlib' 'shared'

23 errors found in build log:
     [ ... ]
  >> 5     getarch_2nd.c:12:35: error: use of undeclared identifier 'SGEMM_DEFAULT_UNROLL_M'
     6         printf("SGEMM_UNROLL_M=%d\n", SGEMM_DEFAULT_UNROLL_M);
     7                                       ^
  >> 8     getarch_2nd.c:13:35: error: use of undeclared identifier 'SGEMM_DEFAULT_UNROLL_N'
     9         printf("SGEMM_UNROLL_N=%d\n", SGEMM_DEFAULT_UNROLL_N);
```
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install openblas % xl@13.1.6
$ spack install openblas % xl@13.1.7
...
```

### Information on your system
**LANL's Darwin system**
```
$ uname -a
Linux cn2023 4.11.0-44.4.1.el7a.ppc64le #1 SMP Sat Dec 9 02:17:51 EST 2017 ppc64le ppc64le ppc64le GNU/Linux
```
